name: Shadow of Asha
description: The village of Narkian is being attacked and corrupted by Asha. Great warriors tried to defeat her, but all failed. The residents of the village are moving out as they do not believe there is hope. However, there is still a chance for the village. Narkin, grandson of Narkian, a great warrior, has the arduous task of facing Asha's darkness and imprisoning her, as her grandfather did in the past.
